exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Design
exterior.description: Enhance the curb appeal by redesigning the front yard with new plants, shrubs, and a small garden. Add a pathway leading to the entrance and install outdoor lighting.

exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway with modern materials like stamped concrete or pavers to improve aesthetics and functionality.

exterior.title: Exterior Painting
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house with a modern color palette to refresh the look and increase curb appeal.

exterior.title: Deck or Patio Installation
exterior.description: Add a deck or patio in the backyard to create an outdoor living space, perfect for entertaining and relaxation.

exterior.title: Fence Repair and Painting
exterior.description: Repair and repaint the existing fence to improve privacy and aesthetics.

kitchen.title: Upgrade to Quartz Countertops
kitchen.description: Replace existing countertops with durable and stylish quartz. This upgrade enhances the kitchen's aesthetic appeal and increases property value.

kitchen.title: Install Energy-Efficient Appliances
kitchen.description: Replace old appliances with energy-efficient models. This not only reduces energy bills but also appeals to eco-conscious buyers.

kitchen.title: Add a Kitchen Island
kitchen.description: Introduce a kitchen island to increase workspace and storage. This addition is highly functional and attractive to potential buyers.

kitchen.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
kitchen.description: Install modern, energy-efficient lighting fixtures to brighten the space and enhance the kitchen's ambiance.

kitchen.title: Repaint Cabinets
kitchen.description: Refresh the kitchen by repainting the cabinets with a modern color. This cost-effective update can significantly improve the kitchen's look.

living area.title: Install a Fireplace
living area.description: Adding a modern electric or gas fireplace can create a cozy atmosphere and serve as a focal point in the living area.

living area.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
living area.description: Replace existing lighting with modern, energy-efficient fixtures to enhance the ambiance and reduce energy costs.

living area.title: Add Built-in Shelving
living area.description: Install custom built-in shelving to maximize storage and add architectural interest to the living space.

living area.title: Install Crown Molding
living area.description: Add crown molding to enhance the elegance and architectural detail of the living area.

living area.title: Paint Accent Wall
living area.description: Create an accent wall with a bold color or textured paint to add visual interest and depth to the room.

bath.title: Upgrade to a Walk-in Shower
bath.description: Replace the existing shower with a modern walk-in shower featuring glass doors and updated fixtures. This enhances accessibility and adds a contemporary touch.

bath.title: Install Heated Flooring
bath.description: Add electric heated flooring to provide comfort during the cold months. This is a desirable feature in the Niagara Region's climate.

bath.title: Vanity and Countertop Replacement
bath.description: Replace the existing vanity and countertop with modern, high-quality materials. This can significantly enhance the bathroom's aesthetic and functionality.

bath.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bath.description: Install energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures to improve the bathroom's ambiance and reduce energy costs.

bath.title: Add a Double Sink
bath.description: Install a double sink to increase convenience and appeal to potential buyers, especially families.

bedroom.title: Add Built-in Wardrobes
bedroom.description: Install built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space and enhance the room's functionality.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace existing lighting with modern, energy-efficient fixtures to improve ambiance and energy savings.

bedroom.title: Install Hardwood Flooring
bedroom.description: Upgrade to high-quality hardwood flooring to increase the room's aesthetic appeal and property value.

bedroom.title: Paint and Wallpaper
bedroom.description: Apply fresh paint and add an accent wall with wallpaper to modernize the room's look.

bedroom.title: Add Crown Molding
bedroom.description: Install crown molding to add elegance and a finished look to the bedroom.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Finishing
unfinished basement.description: Transform the unfinished basement into a livable space by adding drywall, flooring, and lighting. This can include creating a family room, home office, or additional bedroom.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Insulation
unfinished basement.description: Add insulation to the basement walls and ceiling to improve energy efficiency and comfort. This is a relatively simple project that can significantly reduce heating costs.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Bathroom Addition
unfinished basement.description: Install a bathroom in the basement to increase the home's functionality and appeal. This involves plumbing work and can be a valuable addition for large families or guests.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Waterproofing
unfinished basement.description: Seal the basement to prevent water damage and mold growth. This is essential for maintaining the integrity of the home and ensuring a dry, usable space.

unfinished basement.title: Home Theater Installation
unfinished basement.description: Convert part of the basement into a home theater with soundproofing, seating, and a high-quality audio-visual system. This can be a luxurious addition that enhances entertainment options.

other.title: Entryway Refresh
other.description: Update the entryway with a fresh coat of paint, new lighting fixtures, and a modern door handle to enhance the first impression of the home.

other.title: Mudroom Addition
other.description: Convert the entryway into a functional mudroom with built-in storage, seating, and durable flooring to increase utility and appeal.

other.title: Smart Home Integration
other.description: Install smart home features such as a smart lock, thermostat, and lighting system to modernize the home and increase energy efficiency.

other.title: Energy-Efficient Door
other.description: Replace the existing door with an energy-efficient model to improve insulation and reduce energy costs.

other.title: Basement Entry Upgrade
other.description: Enhance the basement entry with improved lighting, waterproofing, and aesthetic upgrades to increase functionality and appeal.
